excerpt: "“A.I. technology has been around since the 1950′s,” Dr. Tobin said. “It helps us perform life sacing surgeries.” Places like Community Hospital are utilizing A.I. in patient care through data security and surgical robots. “It frees up the human component to do the more involved tasks.” Dr. Tobin said."
